get.summary:
The reflection service is structured as a bidirectional stream, ensuring
all related requests go to a single server.

parameters.name: fileByFilename
parameters.description: Find a proto file by the file name.

parameters.name: fileContainingSymbol
parameters.description:
Find the proto file that declares the given fully-qualified symbol name.
This field should be a fully-qualified symbol name
(e.g. <package>.<service>[.<method>] or <package>.<type>).

parameters.name: fileContainingExtension.containingType
parameters.description: Fully-qualified type name. The format should be <package>.<type>

parameters.name: allExtensionNumbersOfType
parameters.description:
Finds the tag numbers used by all known extensions of the given message
type, and appends them to ExtensionNumberResponse in an undefined order.
Its corresponding method is best-effort: it's not guaranteed that the
reflection service will implement this method, and it's not guaranteed
that this method will provide all extensions. Returns
StatusCode::UNIMPLEMENTED if it's not implemented.
This field should be a fully-qualified type name. The format is
<package>.<type>

parameters.name: listServices
parameters.description:
List the full names of registered services. The content will not be
checked.

errorCode.description: This field uses the error codes defined in grpc::StatusCode.

v1ErrorResponse.description: The error code and error message sent by the server when an error occurs.

baseTypeName.title:
Full name of the base type, including the package name. The format
is <package>.<type>

v1ExtensionNumberResponse.description:
A list of extension numbers sent by the server answering
all_extension_numbers_of_type request.

containingType.title: Fully-qualified type name. The format should be <package>.<type>

v1ExtensionRequest.description:
The type name and extension number sent by the client when requesting
file_containing_extension.

fileDescriptorProto.description:
Serialized FileDescriptorProto messages. We avoid taking a dependency on
descriptor.proto, which uses proto2 only features, by making them opaque
bytes instead.

v1FileDescriptorResponse.description:
Serialized FileDescriptorProto messages sent by the server answering
a file_by_filename, file_containing_symbol, or file_containing_extension
request.

fileByFilename.description: Find a proto file by the file name.

fileContainingSymbol.description:
Find the proto file that declares the given fully-qualified symbol name.
This field should be a fully-qualified symbol name
(e.g. <package>.<service>[.<method>] or <package>.<type>).

fileContainingExtension.description:
Find the proto file which defines an extension extending the given
message type with the given field number.

allExtensionNumbersOfType.title:
Finds the tag numbers used by all known extensions of the given message
type, and appends them to ExtensionNumberResponse in an undefined order.
Its corresponding method is best-effort: it's not guaranteed that the
reflection service will implement this method, and it's not guaranteed
that this method will provide all extensions. Returns
StatusCode::UNIMPLEMENTED if it's not implemented.
This field should be a fully-qualified type name. The format is
<package>.<type>

listServices.description:
List the full names of registered services. The content will not be
checked.

v1GetInfoRequest.description: The message sent by the client when calling GetInfo method.

fileDescriptorResponse.description:
This message is used to answer file_by_filename, file_containing_symbol,
file_containing_extension requests with transitive dependencies.
As the repeated label is not allowed in oneof fields, we use a
FileDescriptorResponse message to encapsulate the repeated fields.
The reflection service is allowed to avoid sending FileDescriptorProtos
that were previously sent in response to earlier requests in the stream.

allExtensionNumbersResponse.description: This message is used to answer all_extension_numbers_of_type requests.

listServicesResponse.description: This message is used to answer list_services requests.

errorResponse.description: This message is used when an error occurs.

v1GetInfoResponse.description: The message sent by the server to answer ServerReflectionInfo method.

service.description:
The information of each service may be expanded in the future, so we use
ServiceResponse message to encapsulate it.

v1ListServiceResponse.description: A list of ServiceResponse sent by the server answering list_services request.

name.title:
Full name of a registered service, including its package name. The format
is <package>.<service>

v1ServiceResponse.description:
The information of a single service used by ListServiceResponse to answer
list_services request.
